forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early, then fog developing overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers tapering off early with foggy conditions overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 57F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low around 45F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
